DOC.brief_summary: This study help determine effect vary estradiol level uterine line healthy human undergo stimulate vitro fertilization ( IVF ) cycle .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Varied Estrogen Doses Endometrial Receptivity
DOC.detailed_description: Volunteers wish participate study , undergo diagnostic screening phase determine eligibility . Once eligibility determine , participant undergo three , separate `` endometrial preparatory cycle '' . These cycle consist estrogen supplementation mimic normal , normal , highly elevate estradiol level . Once supplementation complete uterine procedure do hopefully determine effect estrogen level uterine lining . Subcutaneous leuprolide injection , intramuscular estrogen , progesterone injection use mimic level need . Blood draw monitor need estradiol progesterone level injection phase cycle . Once injection phase complete , transvaginal ultrasound , uterine aspiration , endometrial biopsy do .
DOC.criteria: Regular menstrual cycle Age 1850 Normal Baseline ultrasound No intrauterine procedures prior 90 day Any contraindication undergo estrogen stimulation endometrium Age ≥35 year smoke ≥15 cigarette per day Multiple risk factor arterial cardiovascular disease ( smoking , diabetes , hypertension ) Hypertension ( systolic ≥140 mmHg diastolic ≥90 mmHg ) Venous thromboembolism ( current history ) Known thrombogenic mutation Known ischemic heart disease History stroke Complicated valvular heart disease ( pulmonary hypertension , risk atrial fibrillation , history subacute bacterial endocarditis ) Systemic lupus erythematosus ( positive unknown antiphospholipid antibody ) Migraine aura age Breast cancer Cirrhosis Hepatocellular adenoma malignant hepatoma History undiagnosed abnormal uterine bleeding . Allergic reaction study drug Known pregnancy delivery within past 6 month Breastfeeding Obesity > 35 kg/m2
